item.title: ‚öíÔ∏è Tools and Utilities
item.description: These Blocks and Items can be used in various ways to interact with or modify the world around you. Bottle o’ Lightning Enchanted Totem of Undying Poltergeist Stunt Powder Soul Embers

item.title: ‚ö° Redstone
item.description: These Biome Makeover Blocks interact with redstone. This list does not include “basic” blocks such as doors or buttons from Biome Makeover Wood Types.

item.title: üå≤ Natural Blocks
item.description: Trees These Tree Types all have their own wood variant. Ancient Oak Tree - Ancient Oak Wood Willow Tree - Willow Wood Swamp Cypress Tree - Swamp Cypress Wood Blighted Balsa Tree - Blighted Balsa Wood Flowers and Plants Barrel Cactus Saguaro Cactus Black Thistle Foxglove Marigold Buttonbush Wild Mushrooms Purple Glowshrooms Green Glowshrooms Orange Glowshrooms Itching Ivy Ivy Moth Blossom Mycelium Roots Mycelium Sprouts Reeds & Cattails Small Lily Pad Water Lily Tall Red Mushroom Tall Brown Mushroom Willowing Branches Huge Mushroom Blocks Illunite These blocks can be found within Illunite Fissures.

item.title: üçì Food
item.description: These items are edible in some form: Bulbus Root Roasted Bulbus Root Glowshroom Stew Raw Glowfish Cooked Glowfish Raw Crab Cooked Crab Crab Chowder

item.title: üé® Decoration Blocks
item.description: Biome Makeover adds several varieties of decoration block. Stone Variants These stone type blocks have slab, stair and wall variants.

item.title: üé© Hats & Armor
item.description: Biome Makeover adds equipment for you to wear these are. Hats Hats offer little protection, but look stylish. Some may have special abilities.
